Hi Zsolt,

The simplest way to do this is to add a HopsPathMatchesRegexDeci=
deRule to your scope. Set the rule to REJECT matches and configure the regu=
lar expression as ".*L.*". This will reject any URLs whose hop paths includ=
e an L hop (i.e. link) while allowing embeds, redirects and preconditions t=
o be fetched.

The below is untested but should work:

        <bean class=
=3D"org.archive.modules.deciderules.HopsPathMatchesRegexDecideRule">
      =
          <property name=3D"decision" value=3D"REJECT" />
                <=
property name=3D"regex" value=3D".*L.*" />
        </bean>

Just insert it =
into the scope immediately prior to the preconditions rule.

- Kris
